weapons.name: Splat Charger
weapons.hint_base_damage: 40–100These are the values used by the game for damage scaling; numbers in this range are not necessarily guaranteed to be possible to achieve in-game. For example, 100 is overridden by the full charge damage value, so it will never be seen in-game. (Partial charge) / 160 (Full charge)
